class.name: LZ4Compressor
class.brief_description: A class that can compress and decompress data as lz4.
class.description: A class that can compress and decompress data as lz4.

method.name: compress_data
method.description: Compress the given data using lz4.

method.name: decompress_data
method.description: Decompress the given data using lz4.
